what: Ordering authorships for R packages hosted on GitHub
title: Ordering authorships for R packages hosted on GitHub
text: goal githubContributors help obtain order GitHub user contributions, can used example determine inform authorship order R packages.

title: Ordering authorships for R packages hosted on GitHub
text: can install development version githubContributors like :
code: # If package `remotes` isn't already installed, install it with `install.packages("remotes")` remotes::install_github("rempsyc/githubContributors")

title: Ordering authorships for R packages hosted on GitHub
code: library(githubContributors)  report <- get_contributions("report", user = "easystats") order_authors(report) #> DominiqueMakowski, strengejacke, IndrajeetPatil, rempsyc, bwiernik, mattansb #>             username  added deleted commit  score #> 1  DominiqueMakowski 203778  148154    325 351932 #> 18      strengejacke   5798   38360    234  44158 #> 2     IndrajeetPatil  15198   10565    168  25763 #> 17           rempsyc   4404    3803     25   8207 #> 4           bwiernik   1561     240     12   1801 #> 14          mattansb   1009     603     14   1612  datawizard <- get_contributions("datawizard", user = "easystats") order_authors(datawizard) #> IndrajeetPatil, strengejacke, etiennebacher, bwiernik, DominiqueMakowski, rempsyc, mattansb #>            username added deleted commit score #> 2    IndrajeetPatil 47402   30891    336 78293 #> 7      strengejacke 34002   10809    503 44811 #> 4     etiennebacher 16539    7346    161 23885 #> 3          bwiernik  4276    2072     11  6348 #> 1 DominiqueMakowski  3108     733     26  3841 #> 6           rempsyc  1657     149      5  1806 #> 5          mattansb  1353     339     17  1692  performance <- get_contributions("performance", user = "easystats") order_authors(performance) #> strengejacke, DominiqueMakowski, IndrajeetPatil, rempsyc, mattansb, bwiernik, etiennebacher #>             username added deleted commit  score #> 15      strengejacke 67884   61034   1426 128918 #> 2  DominiqueMakowski 50278   25317    141  75595 #> 3     IndrajeetPatil 21182   11440    163  32622 #> 14           rempsyc  9201    4023     26  13224 #> 10          mattansb  8036    2670     60  10706 #> 6           bwiernik  7406    2543     41   9949 #> 7      etiennebacher  1553    1371      7   2924  lavaan <- get_contributions("lavaan", user = "yrosseel") order_authors(lavaan) #> yrosseel, TDJorgensen #>       username  added deleted commit  score #> 14    yrosseel 202551  116950   1608 319501 #> 3  TDJorgensen   1627     697     61   2324  dplyr <- get_contributions("dplyr", user = "tidyverse") order_authors(dplyr) #> romainfrancois, hadley, krlmlr, DavisVaughan, lionel-, batpigandme, hannes, zeehio, jennybc #>           username  added deleted commit   score #> 81  romainfrancois 895054  901061   2737 1796115 #> 41          hadley 198717  216820   1987  415537 #> 60          krlmlr 163514  107406    741  270920 #> 1     DavisVaughan  62423   28392    288   90815 #> 63         lionel-  45315   20400    623   65715 #> 13     batpigandme  10469    7808     38   18277 #> 42          hannes   1364     153     16    1517 #> 100         zeehio    883     252      8    1135 #> 50         jennybc    876     145     11    1021  ggplot2 <- get_contributions("ggplot2", user = "tidyverse") order_authors(ggplot2) #> hadley, thomasp85, topepo, lionel-, wch, clauswilke, krlmlr, dpseidel, karawoo, teunbrand, kohske, paleolimbot, yutannihilation, mine-cetinkaya-rundel, jiho, hrbrmstr, JakeRuss, batpigandme #>                  username  added deleted commit  score #> 41                 hadley 344336  253389   2274 597725 #> 90              thomasp85 127149  118915    296 246064 #> 95                 topepo  97837  111710     10 209547 #> 64                lionel-  81805   44588     59 126393 #> 97                    wch  32728   35042    589  67770 #> 21             clauswilke  33090   28134    102  61224 #> 62                 krlmlr  27218   17516      7  44734 #> 33               dpseidel  17923   16615      7  34538 #> 56                karawoo  12246    8578     54  20824 #> 89              teunbrand  10333    5787    118  16120 #> 61                 kohske   6970    4065    194  11035 #> 79            paleolimbot   7579    2777     47  10356 #> 100       yutannihilation   5438    4161    157   9599 #> 72  mine-cetinkaya-rundel   2116      40      6   2156 #> 50                   jiho   1291     756     62   2047 #> 43               hrbrmstr   1057 title: Ordering authorships for R packages hosted on GitHub
text: code package contributed StackOverFlow user Chamkrai.

title: Get GitHub contributions — get_contributions
text: Get GitHub contributions, can ordered order_authors().

title: Get GitHub contributions — get_contributions
text: data frame username contributor, number added lines code, deleted lines code, number commits.

title: Get GitHub contributions — get_contributions
code: head(get_contributions("report")) #>                             username  added deleted commit #> 1                  DominiqueMakowski 204185  148413    328 #> 2                     IndrajeetPatil  15387   10883    192 #> 3                      LukasWallrich      1       1      1 #> 4                           M-Colley      3       3      1 #> 5                         Olexandr88      1       1      1 #> 6 apps/copilot-pull-request-reviewer   2561     956      1

title: Order GitHub authors — order_authors
text: Order GitHub authors based contributions (obtained get_contributions()).

title: Order GitHub authors — order_authors
text: data data commit.weight multiplication constant representing weight number commits (setting 0, default, make impact). cutoff Cutoff score exclude contributors filtered list.

title: Order GitHub authors — order_authors
text: data frame username contributor, number added lines code, deleted lines code, number commits, total 'score' column representing sum columns.

title: Order GitHub authors — order_authors
code: x <- get_contributions("report") order_authors(x) #> DominiqueMakowski, strengejacke, rempsyc, IndrajeetPatil, apps/copilot-swe-agent, apps/copilot-pull-request-reviewer, mattansb, bwiernik  #>  #>                              username  added deleted commit  score #> 1                   DominiqueMakowski 204185  148413    328 352598 #> 26                       strengejacke   7978   38980    267  46958 #> 25                            rempsyc  20427   10215    127  30642 #> 2                      IndrajeetPatil  15387   10883    192  26270 #> 7              apps/copilot-swe-agent   6011    1958     35   7969 #> 6  apps/copilot-pull-request-reviewer   2561     956      1   3517 #> 22                           mattansb   1350     892     22   2242 #> 10                           bwiernik   1793     241     15   2034
